ExcludeByDDNS.PluginDescription: This plugin allows you to dynamically exclude a IP using DDNS update.
ExcludeByDDNS.DDNSSettingsDescription: Here you can change the settings used to exclude your dynamic ip address.
ExcludeByDDNS.CurrentExcludedIp: Your currently excluded IP is: %s (last update: %s)
ExcludeByDDNS.NoIpExcluded: You have currently no excluded IP set.
ExcludeByDDNS.DDNSUpdateExclusion: Use DDNS update to refresh the excluded IP
ExcludeByDDNS.DDNSUpdateExclusionDesc: In order to exclude your dynamic ip address using DDNS update, use the following url:
ExcludeByDDNS.DDNSUpdateExclusionDesc2: You do not need to pass any other data like hostname, username or password. Leave them empty or type in anything if the value is required.
ExcludeByDDNS.HostnameExclusion: Use automatic updated hostname to refresh excluded IP
ExcludeByDDNS.HostnameExclusionDesc: If you are already using a DDNS update to update a specific hostname you can use this hostname to refresh the excluded IP.
ExcludeByDDNS.HostnameExclusionDesc2: The update will be done as an hourly task resolving the hostname's IP
ExcludeByDDNS.NoExclusionsSet: There are currently no exclusions configured.
ExcludeByDDNS.HostnameError: Unable to resolve the IP of the given hostname
